name: 沈耀明
objective:
1.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。2.輸出入和儲存系統(Input/Output and Storage Systems )。3.
系統軟體(System Software)。4.另類計算機結構Alternative Architectures)。5.嵌入式系統(Embedded Systems)。6.效率量測與分析(Performance Measurement and Analysis)。7.網路組織與架構(Network Organization and Architecture)。
schedule:
1	課程介紹	
2                Review Ch1 ~ Ch5
3	Ch6. Memory 1
4	Ch6. Memory 2
5	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems 1	
6	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems 2	
7	Ch8. System Software 1	
8	Ch8. System Software 2	
9	Mid-term test 期中考
10	Ch9. Alternative Architectures 1	
11	Ch9. Alternative Architectures 2	
12	Ch10. Topics in Embedded Systems 1	
13	Ch10. Topics in Embedded Systems 2	
14	Ch11. Performance Measurement and Analysis 1	
15	Ch11. Performance Measurement and Analysis 2	
16	Ch12. Network Organization and Architecture 1
17	Ch12. Network Organization and Architecture 2	
18	Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
評分標準:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔40%
3.	作業佔15%
4.	出席情況佔10%, 缺席一次扣1%, 遲到或早退各扣0.5%.
materials:
本學期使用的課本:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 3/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
連絡人: 儲方
電話:0988202210
